name: What is API Management
description: Azure API Management (APIM) is a managed service for publishing and governing APIs via an API gateway, a management plane, and a developer portal.
summary: Primary roles: gateway (runtime), management plane (configuration), developer portal (consumer onboarding).
Common outcomes: consistent auth, traffic shaping, observability, versioning, and API lifecycle controls.
Typical placement: in front of HTTP APIs hosted on Azure or elsewhere.
nextSteps: Review APIM core components and terminology.
Decide connectivity model (public, private, hybrid with self-hosted gateway).
Pick a SKU and align it with required capabilities (VNet, multi-region, self-hosted gateway, AI gateway).
